name: SustainableDino
description:
Description of Game 

This game teaches you about sustainability and is meant for children 3-6. Sure, we can do things to help sustainability now, but what about the future, it will be in the hands of the coming generations. Kids will have fun playing this game not even knowing they are developing a good mindset on this topic. The UN goals that are faced in this game are Life on land by teaching about deforestation and Life below water by informing how plastic pollution is bad.

How to Play

WASD or Arrow Keys to move around, each level has a minigame and you must beat that minigame to complete the level. Total of two levels as the game is in beta.
